If you have configured more than one network interface, make sure to match the order of
 `network_adapters` and `ipconfig`.

 Usage example (JSON):

 ```json
 [
   {
     "ip": "192.168.1.55/24",
     "gateway": "192.168.1.1",
     "ip6": "fda8:a260:6eda:20::4da/128",
     "gateway6": "fda8:a260:6eda:20::1"
   }
 ]
 ```
